ViewObject.Name: AllUserProdukExtShuttleView
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_EXT, FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_EXT_DESC FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_ITEM_MASTER_CATEGORY FcsViewItemMasterCategory WHERE 1=1 AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_EXT IS NOT NULL AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_CATEGORY IN ( SELECT NVL(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT LISTAGG(AUL.PROD_CATEGORY,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUL.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_PRODUK_CATEGORY AUL WHERE AUL.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+',1,LEVEL)),FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_CATEGORY) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=REGEXP_COUNT((SELECT LISTAGG(AUL.PROD_CATEGORY,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUL.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_PRODUK_CATEGORY AUL WHERE AUL.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+') ) AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_CLASS IN ( SELECT NVL(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT LISTAGG(AUT.PROD_CLASS,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUT.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_PRODUK_CLASS AUT WHERE AUT.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+',1,LEVEL)),FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_CLASS) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=REGEXP_COUNT((SELECT LISTAGG(AUT.PROD_CLASS,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUT.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_PRODUK_CLASS AUT WHERE AUT.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+') ) AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_BRAND IN ( SELECT NVL(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT LISTAGG(AUG.PROD_BRAND,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUG.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_PRODUK_BRAND AUG WHERE AUG.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+',1,LEVEL)),FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_BRAND) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=REGEXP_COUNT((SELECT LISTAGG(AUG.PROD_BRAND,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUG.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_PRODUK_BRAND AUG WHERE AUG.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+') ) AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_PACKAGING IN ( SELECT NVL(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT LISTAGG(AUL.PROD_PACK,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUL.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_PRODUK_PACK AUL WHERE AUL.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+',1,LEVEL)),FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_PACKAGING) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=REGEXP_COUNT((SELECT LISTAGG(AUL.PROD_PACK,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUL.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_PRODUK_PACK AUL WHERE AUL.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+') ) AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_VARIANT IN ( SELECT NVL(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT LISTAGG(AUL.PROD_VARIANT,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUL.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_PRODUK_VARIANT AUL WHERE AUL.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+',1,LEVEL)),FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_VARIANT) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=REGEXP_COUNT((SELECT LISTAGG(AUL.PROD_VARIANT,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUL.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_PRODUK_VARIANT AUL WHERE AUL.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+') ) AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.ITEM IN ( SELECT NVL(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT LISTAGG(AUL.PROD_ITEM,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUL.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_PRODUK_ITEM AUL WHERE AUL.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+',1,LEVEL)),FcsViewItemMasterCategory.ITEM) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL<=REGEXP_COUNT((SELECT LISTAGG(AUL.PROD_ITEM,';') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUL.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_PRODUK_ITEM AUL WHERE AUL.USER_NAME = :userName),'[^;'']+') ) GROUP BY FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_EXT, FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_EXT_DESC ORDER BY FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_EXT_DESC
